title: Print, "Bathing at Long Branch, "Oh, ain't it cold !"", August 26, 1871
medium: Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Cora E. Wilson
description: Horizontal view of three girls in bathing suits in the water, and an indication in the right distance of two more figures in the water.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Bathing at Long Branch, "Oh, ain't it cold !"", August 26, 1871.
August 26, 1871. Wood engraving printed in black ink on paper. Gift of Cora Wilson. 1939-70-8.
